mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T13_GEN_JOIN ( ID , NO , GEN_NO , STATUS , APPLICATION_TEXT , REPLY_TEXT , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME , LAST_USER , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{Id} , #{No} , #{GenNo} , #{Status} , #{ApplicationText} , #{ReplyText} , #{CreateUser} , #{CreateDate} , #{CreateTime} , #{LastUser} , curdate() , curtime() )
mapper.update: UPDATE T13_GEN_JOIN SET NO = #{No} , GEN_NO = #{GenNo} , STATUS = #{Status} , APPLICATION_TEXT = #{ApplicationText} , REPLY_TEXT = #{ReplyText} , CREATE_USER = #{CreateUser} , CREATE_DATE = #{CreateDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{CreateTime} , LAST_USER = #{LastUser} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE ID = #{Id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "Id" , NO AS "No" , GEN_NO AS "GenNo" , STATUS AS "Status" , APPLICATION_TEXT AS "ApplicationText" , REPLY_TEXT AS "ReplyText" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T13_GEN_JOIN WHERE ID = #{Id}

SELECT ID AS "Id" , NO AS "No" , GEN_NO AS "GenNo" , STATUS AS "Status" , APPLICATION_TEXT AS "ApplicationText" , REPLY_TEXT AS "ReplyText" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T13_GEN_JOIN WHERE ID = #{Id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "Id" , NO AS "No" , GEN_NO AS "GenNo" , STATUS AS "Status" , APPLICATION_TEXT AS "ApplicationText" , REPLY_TEXT AS "ReplyText" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T13_GEN_JOIN WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
